00013 #define BODIES_P2P_BIT_NB 20 /* There will never be 2^20 bodies in one leaf ... */  
00014 #define BODIES_GET_P2P_BIT_FIELD(p_b) ((p_b)->size_allocated)

00018 /* Nb direct interactions: */
00019 #define NB_DIRECT_INT_MUTUAL(nb_bodies_tgt, nb_bodies_src) ((nb_bodies_tgt) * (nb_bodies_src) * 2)
00020 #define NB_DIRECT_INT_NOMUTUAL(nb_bodies_tgt, nb_bodies_src) ((nb_bodies_tgt) * (nb_bodies_src))
00021 /* With the mutual interaction principle, we compute sum_{i=0}^{n-2} sum_{j=i+1}^{n-1} 1 = n(n-1)/2 
00022  * interactions but this correspond to n(n-1) computations. */
00023 #define NB_OWN_INT(nb_bodies) ((nb_bodies) * ((nb_bodies) - 1)) 
00024 #define NB_OWN_INT_MAX(nb_bodies, nmax) (((nb_bodies) - 1) * (nmax))

00045 **********************************************************************************************

00047 /* Size of 1 body = 88 bytes */
00048 typedef struct {
00049   bodies_ind_t nb_bodies;
00050   bodies_ind_t size_allocated;  /* WARNING: we use here the bit #BODIES_P2P_BIT_NB 
00051                                  * for P2P operations! */
00052 
00053 /*   thread_ind_t thread_owner; /\* for debugging only *\/ */
00054   body_t *p_bodies;
00055 } body_array_t;
00056

00060   return p_b->nb_bodies;
00061 }

00190 /*********************************************************************************************
00191 **********************************************************************************************
00192 **********************************************************************************************
00193 
00194    body_array_it_t
00195 
00196 **********************************************************************************************
00197 **********************************************************************************************
00198 **********************************************************************************************/
00199 
00200 typedef struct {
00201   bodies_ind_t counter; /* At the beginning counter equals nb_bodies-2, 
00202                          * and when counter equals -1 the iterator's current body 
00203                          * is the last body of the arrays. */
00204   body_array_t *p_corresponding_body_array; /* for 'body_array_it_Remove_current()' */
00205   body_t *p_current_body;
00206 } body_array_it_t;
00207 
00208 
00209 FMB_INLINE body_array_t *body_array_it_Get_body_array(body_array_it_t *p_i){
00210   return p_i->p_corresponding_body_array;
00211 }
00212 
00213 FMB_INLINE void body_array_it_Initialize(body_array_it_t *p_i, body_array_t *p_b){
00214   p_i->counter = body_array_Nb_bodies(p_b)-1; /* see 'body_array_it_Is_valid()' */
00215   p_i->p_corresponding_body_array = p_b;
00216   p_i->p_current_body = p_b->p_bodies;
00217 }
00218 
00219 FMB_INLINE bool body_array_it_Is_valid(body_array_it_t *p_i){
00220   return (p_i->counter >= 0); /* This is supposed to be the quickest test. */
00221 }
00222 
00223 /* Returns TRUE if *p_i_1 is strictly 'lower' than *p_i_2, 
00224  * i.e. there has been (strictly) more calls to 'body_array_it_Go2Next()'
00225  * for p_i_2 than for p_i_1. */
00226 FMB_INLINE bool body_array_it_Is_strictly_lower(body_array_it_t *p_i_1, body_array_it_t *p_i_2){
00227 #ifdef _DEBUG_
00228   if (p_i_1->p_corresponding_body_array != p_i_2->p_corresponding_body_array){
00229     FMB_error("Error in body_array_it_Is_strictly_lower(): the two iterators do not correspond to the same 'body_array_t' variable.");
00230   }
00231 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */
00232   return p_i_1->counter > p_i_2->counter;
00233 }
00234 
00235 FMB_INLINE void body_array_it_Go2Next(body_array_it_t *p_i){
00236   p_i->counter--;
00237   p_i->p_current_body++;
00238 }
00239 
00240 /* We define all the "body_array_it_Go2Next_No*()" functions as "body_array_it_Go2Next() 
00241  * since there is no difference here. */
00242 #define body_array_it_Go2Next_NoS(p_i) body_array_it_Go2Next(p_i)
00243 #define body_array_it_Go2Next_NoFS(p_i) body_array_it_Go2Next(p_i)
00244 #define body_array_it_Go2Next_NoPVS(p_i) body_array_it_Go2Next(p_i)
00245 #define body_array_it_Go2Next_NoPFS(p_i) body_array_it_Go2Next(p_i)
00246 #define body_array_it_Go2Next_NoPVFS(p_i) body_array_it_Go2Next(p_i)
00247 #define body_array_it_Go2Next_NoPPS(p_i) body_array_it_Go2Next(p_i)
00248 
00249

00335 /*! Returns all the fields currently pointed by the iterator \n
00336   in a 'body_t' variable (*p_body_out). */
00337 FMB_INLINE void body_array_it_Get_body(body_array_it_t *p_i, body_t *p_body_out){
00338   position_Affect(body_Get_p_position(p_body_out), body_array_it_Get_p_position(p_i));
00339   body_Set_value(p_body_out, body_array_it_Get_value(p_i));
00340   position_Affect(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_out), body_array_it_Get_p_force_vector(p_i));
00341   position_Affect(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body_out), body_array_it_Get_p_speed_vector(p_i));
00342 }

00371 /*********************************************************************************************

00385 /*! This structure is used to store (retrieve, update ...) the fields of the bodies \n
00386   in each cell. Each field of a body is stored in a dedicated array. */
00387 typedef struct {
00388   bodies_ind_t nb_bodies;
00389   bodies_ind_t size_allocated;  /* WARNING: we use here the bit #BODIES_P2P_BIT_NB 
00390                                  * for P2P operations! */
00391   /* Positions: */
00392   COORDINATES_T *p_pos_x;
00393   COORDINATES_T *p_pos_y;
00394   COORDINATES_T *p_pos_z; 
00395 
00396   /* Values: */
00397   VALUES_T *p_values;
00398 
00399   /* Force vectors: */
00400   COORDINATES_T *p_fx;
00401   COORDINATES_T *p_fy;
00402   COORDINATES_T *p_fz;
00403 
00404   /* Speed vectors: */
00405   position_t *p_speed_vectors;
00406 
00407 } body_split_array_t;
00408 
00409 
00410

00412 FMB_INLINE bodies_ind_t body_split_array_Nb_bodies(body_split_array_t *p_b){
00413   return p_b->nb_bodies;
00414 }
00415 
00416 /* We must have: 0 <= body_number <= (p_b->nb_bodies - 1) */
00417 FMB_INLINE VALUES_T body_split_array_Get_value(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00418   return p_b->p_values[body_number];
00419 }
00420 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_value(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, VALUES_T value){
00421   p_b->p_values[body_number] = value;
00422 }
00423 FMB_INLINE VALUES_T *body_split_array_Get_p_value(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00424   return p_b->p_values + body_number;
00425 }
00426 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_Get_pos_x(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00427   return p_b->p_pos_x[body_number];
00428 }

00430   return p_b->p_pos_y[body_number];

00435 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_pos_x(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, COORDINATES_T new_pos_x){
00436   p_b->p_pos_x[body_number] = new_pos_x;
00437 }
00438 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_pos_y(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, COORDINATES_T new_pos_y){
00439   p_b->p_pos_y[body_number] = new_pos_y;
00440 }
00441 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_pos_z(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, COORDINATES_T new_pos_z){
00442   p_b->p_pos_z[body_number] = new_pos_z;
00443 }
00444 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_position(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, position_t *p_new_position){
00445   body_split_array_Set_pos_x(p_b, body_number, position_Get_x(p_new_position));
00446   body_split_array_Set_pos_y(p_b, body_number, position_Get_y(p_new_position));
00447   body_split_array_Set_pos_z(p_b, body_number, position_Get_z(p_new_position));
00448 }
00449 FMB_INLINE position_t *body_split_array_Get_p_speed_vector(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00450   return p_b->p_speed_vectors + body_number;
00451 }
00452 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_speed_vector(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, position_t *p_new_speed_vector){
00453   position_Affect(p_b->p_speed_vectors + body_number, p_new_speed_vector); 
00454 }
00455 
00456 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_Get_fx(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00457   return p_b->p_fx[body_number];
00458 }
00459 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_Get_fy(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00460   return p_b->p_fy[body_number];
00461 }
00462 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_Get_fz(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number){
00463   return p_b->p_fz[body_number];
00464 }
00465 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_fx(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, COORDINATES_T new_fx){ 
00466   p_b->p_fx[body_number] = new_fx; 
00467 }
00468 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_fy(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, COORDINATES_T new_fy){ 
00469   p_b->p_fy[body_number] = new_fy; 
00470 }
00471 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_fz(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, COORDINATES_T new_fz){ 
00472   p_b->p_fz[body_number] = new_fz; 
00473 }
00474 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Set_force_vector(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number, position_t *p_new_force_vector){ 
00475   body_split_array_Set_fx(p_b, body_number, position_Get_x(p_new_force_vector));
00476   body_split_array_Set_fy(p_b, body_number, position_Get_y(p_new_force_vector));
00477   body_split_array_Set_fz(p_b, body_number, position_Get_z(p_new_force_vector));
00478 }
00479 
00480 
00481 
00482 
00483 
00484 
00485 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_Diplay_body(body_split_array_t *p_b,
00486                                              bodies_ind_t body_number, 
00487                                              FILE *f){
00488 
00489   display_body_fields(body_split_array_Get_pos_x(p_b, body_number),
00490                       body_split_array_Get_pos_y(p_b, body_number),
00491                       body_split_array_Get_pos_z(p_b, body_number),
00492                       body_split_array_Get_value(p_b, body_number),
00493                       body_split_array_Get_fx(p_b, body_number),
00494                       body_split_array_Get_fy(p_b, body_number),
00495                       body_split_array_Get_fz(p_b, body_number),
00496                       body_split_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b, body_number),
00497                       f);
00498 }
00499 
00500 
00501 
00502 
00503 
00504 void body_split_array_Initialize(body_split_array_t *p_b,
00505                            bodies_ind_t initial_size_allocated);
00506 
00507 void body_split_array_Free(body_split_array_t *p_b);
00508 
00509 void body_split_array_Realloc_arrays(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t new_size);
00510 
00511 /* All the arrays are reallocated to a size of S. */
00512 void body_split_array_Clear(body_split_array_t *p_b);
00513 
00514 /* Fill the 'forces' and 'potential' vectors (when they exist) with 0.0 */
00515 void body_split_array_ClearFP(body_split_array_t *p_b);
00516 
00517 bool body_split_array_Is_full(body_split_array_t *p_b);
00518 
00519 void body_split_array_Adjust_memory(body_split_array_t *p_b);
00520 
00521 /*! All the arrays are copied: \n
00522   see the use of this function in subdivide_leaf_octree() in the file "octree.c". */
00523 void body_split_array_Affect(body_split_array_t *p_target, body_split_array_t *p_src);
00524 
00525 /*! Do a copy of each field: */
00526 void body_split_array_Add(body_split_array_t *p_b, 
00527                           body_t *p_body);
00528 
00529 /* Remove the body #body_number: */
00530 void body_split_array_Remove(body_split_array_t *p_b, bodies_ind_t body_number);
00531 
00532 void body_split_array_Display(body_split_array_t *p_b, FILE *f);
00533 
00534 long body_split_array_Get_mem_used(body_split_array_t *p_b);
00535 
00536 
00537 
00538 
00539 
00540 
00541 
00542 
00543 
00544                      
00545 /*********************************************************************************************
00546 **********************************************************************************************
00547 **********************************************************************************************
00548 
00549    body_split_array_it_t
00550 
00551 **********************************************************************************************
00552 **********************************************************************************************
00553 **********************************************************************************************/
00554 
00555 typedef struct {
00556   bodies_ind_t counter; /* At the beginning counter equals nb_bodies-2, 
00557                          * and when counter equals -1 the iterator's current body 
00558                          * is the last body of the arrays. */
00559   body_split_array_t *p_corresponding_body_split_array; /* for 'body_split_array_it_Remove_current()' */
00560   /* A pointer on the current position in each array 
00561    * (i.e. a pointer for each field of the current body): */
00562   COORDINATES_T *p_current_pos_x;
00563   COORDINATES_T *p_current_pos_y;
00564   COORDINATES_T *p_current_pos_z;
00565 
00566   VALUES_T *p_current_value;
00567   COORDINATES_T *p_current_fx;
00568   COORDINATES_T *p_current_fy;
00569   COORDINATES_T *p_current_fz;
00570   position_t *p_current_speed_vector;
00571 } body_split_array_it_t;
00572 
00573 
00574 
00575 FMB_INLINE body_split_array_t *body_split_array_it_Get_body_split_array(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00576   return p_i->p_corresponding_body_split_array;
00577 }
00578 
00579 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Initialize(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, body_split_array_t *p_b){
00580   p_i->counter = body_split_array_Nb_bodies(p_b)-1; /* see 'body_split_array_it_Is_valid()' */
00581   p_i->p_corresponding_body_split_array = p_b;
00582   p_i->p_current_pos_x = p_b->p_pos_x;
00583   p_i->p_current_pos_y = p_b->p_pos_y;
00584   p_i->p_current_pos_z = p_b->p_pos_z;
00585   p_i->p_current_value = body_split_array_Get_p_value(p_b, 0);
00586   p_i->p_current_fx = p_b->p_fx;
00587   p_i->p_current_fy = p_b->p_fy;
00588   p_i->p_current_fz = p_b->p_fz;
00589   /* This might be useless if there is no access to *p_current_speed_vector
00590    * afterwards, but it is tedious to write different iterators 
00591    * (the best will be a C++ template class). */
00592   p_i->p_current_speed_vector = body_split_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b, 0);
00593 }
00594 
00595 FMB_INLINE bool body_split_array_it_Is_valid(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00596   return (p_i->counter >= 0); /* This is supposed to be the quickest test. */
00597 }
00598 
00599 /* Returns TRUE if *p_i_1 is strictly 'lower' than *p_i_2, 
00600  * i.e. there has been (strictly) more calls to 'body_split_array_it_Go2Next()'
00601  * for p_i_2 than for p_i_1. */
00602 FMB_INLINE bool body_split_array_it_Is_strictly_lower(body_split_array_it_t *p_i_1, body_split_array_it_t *p_i_2){
00603 #ifdef _DEBUG_
00604   if (p_i_1->p_corresponding_body_split_array != p_i_2->p_corresponding_body_split_array){
00605     FMB_error("Error in body_split_array_it_Is_strictly_lower(): the two iterators do not correspond to the same 'body_split_array_t' variable.");
00606   }
00607 #endif /* #ifdef _DEBUG_ */
00608   return p_i_1->counter > p_i_2->counter;
00609 }
00610 
00611 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Go2Next(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00612   p_i->counter--;
00613   p_i->p_current_pos_x++;
00614   p_i->p_current_pos_y++;
00615   p_i->p_current_pos_z++;
00616   p_i->p_current_value++;
00617   p_i->p_current_fx++;
00618   p_i->p_current_fy++;
00619   p_i->p_current_fz++;
00620   p_i->p_current_speed_vector++;
00621 }
00622 
00623 /* The p_current_speed_vector is not incremented. 
00624  * It is up to the user to ensure that no access 
00625  * to *p_current_speed_vector will be done afterwards! */
00626 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Go2Next_NoS(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00627   p_i->counter--;
00628   p_i->p_current_pos_x++;
00629   p_i->p_current_pos_y++;
00630   p_i->p_current_pos_z++;
00631   p_i->p_current_value++;
00632   p_i->p_current_fx++;
00633   p_i->p_current_fy++;
00634   p_i->p_current_fz++;
00635 }
00636 /* p_current_force_vector and p_current_speed_vector are not incremented. */
00637 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Go2Next_NoFS(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00638   p_i->counter--;
00639   p_i->p_current_pos_x++;
00640   p_i->p_current_pos_y++;
00641   p_i->p_current_pos_z++;
00642   p_i->p_current_value++;
00643 }
00644 /* p_current_pos_{x,y,z}, p_current_value and p_current_speed_vector are not incremented. */
00645 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Go2Next_NoPVS(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00646   p_i->counter--;
00647   p_i->p_current_fx++;
00648   p_i->p_current_fy++;
00649   p_i->p_current_fz++;
00650 }
00651 /* p_current_pos_{x,y,z}, p_current_f{x,y,z}_vector and p_current_speed_vector are not incremented. */
00652 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Go2Next_NoPFS(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00653   p_i->counter--;
00654   p_i->p_current_value++;
00655 }
00656 /* p_current_pos_{x,y,z}, p_current_value, p_current_f{x,y,z}_vector and p_current_speed_vector are not incremented. */
00657 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Go2Next_NoPVFS(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00658   p_i->counter--;
00659 }
00660 /* p_current_pos_{x,y,z}, p_current_potential and p_current_speed_vector are not incremented. */
00661 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Go2Next_NoPPS(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00662   p_i->counter--;
00663   p_i->p_current_value++;
00664   p_i->p_current_fx++;
00665   p_i->p_current_fy++;
00666   p_i->p_current_fz++;
00667 }
00668 
00669 
00670 /***** Elementary fonctions to access the fields of the current body of the iterator: *****/
00671 FMB_INLINE VALUES_T body_split_array_it_Get_value(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00672   return *(p_i->p_current_value);
00673 }
00674 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_value(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, VALUES_T value){
00675   *(p_i->p_current_value) = value;
00676 }
00677 FMB_INLINE VALUES_T *body_split_array_it_Get_p_value(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00678   return p_i->p_current_value;
00679 }
00680 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_it_Get_pos_x(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00681   return *(p_i->p_current_pos_x);
00682 }
00683 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_it_Get_pos_y(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00684   return *(p_i->p_current_pos_y);
00685 }
00686 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_it_Get_pos_z(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00687   return *(p_i->p_current_pos_z);
00688 }
00689 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_pos_x(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, COORDINATES_T new_pos_x){
00690   *(p_i->p_current_pos_x) = new_pos_x;
00691 }
00692 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_pos_y(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, COORDINATES_T new_pos_y){
00693   *(p_i->p_current_pos_y) = new_pos_y;
00694 }
00695 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_pos_z(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, COORDINATES_T new_pos_z){
00696   *(p_i->p_current_pos_z) = new_pos_z;
00697 }
00698 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_position(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, position_t *p_new_position){
00699   body_split_array_it_Set_pos_x(p_i, position_Get_x(p_new_position));
00700   body_split_array_it_Set_pos_y(p_i, position_Get_y(p_new_position));
00701   body_split_array_it_Set_pos_z(p_i, position_Get_z(p_new_position));
00702 }
00703 FMB_INLINE position_t *body_split_array_it_Get_p_speed_vector(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00704   return p_i->p_current_speed_vector;
00705 }
00706 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_speed_vector(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, position_t *p_new_speed_vector){
00707   position_Affect(p_i->p_current_speed_vector, p_new_speed_vector); 
00708 }
00709 
00710 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_it_Get_fx(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00711   return *(p_i->p_current_fx);
00712 }
00713 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_it_Get_fy(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00714   return *(p_i->p_current_fy);
00715 }
00716 FMB_INLINE COORDINATES_T body_split_array_it_Get_fz(body_split_array_it_t *p_i){
00717   return *(p_i->p_current_fz);
00718 }
00719 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_fx(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, COORDINATES_T new_fx){ 
00720   *(p_i->p_current_fx) = new_fx;
00721 }
00722 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_fy(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, COORDINATES_T new_fy){ 
00723   *(p_i->p_current_fy) = new_fy;
00724 }
00725 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_fz(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, COORDINATES_T new_fz){ 
00726   *(p_i->p_current_fz) = new_fz;
00727 }
00728 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Set_force_vector(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, position_t *p_new_force_vector){ 
00729   body_split_array_it_Set_fx(p_i, position_Get_x(p_new_force_vector));
00730   body_split_array_it_Set_fy(p_i, position_Get_y(p_new_force_vector));
00731   body_split_array_it_Set_fz(p_i, position_Get_z(p_new_force_vector));
00732 }
00733 
00734 
00735 
00736 
00737 
00738 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Display_body(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, FILE *f){
00739 
00740   display_body_fields(body_split_array_it_Get_pos_x(p_i),
00741                       body_split_array_it_Get_pos_y(p_i),
00742                       body_split_array_it_Get_pos_z(p_i),
00743                       body_split_array_it_Get_value(p_i),
00744                       body_split_array_it_Get_fx(p_i),
00745                       body_split_array_it_Get_fy(p_i),
00746                       body_split_array_it_Get_fz(p_i),
00747                       body_split_array_it_Get_p_speed_vector(p_i),
00748                       f);
00749 }
00750 
00751 
00752 
00753 
00754 
00755 /*! Returns all the fields currently pointed by the iterator \n
00756   in a 'body_t' variable (*p_body_out). */
00757 FMB_INLINE void body_split_array_it_Get_body(body_split_array_it_t *p_i, body_t *p_body_out){
00758 
00759   position_Set_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body_out), body_split_array_it_Get_pos_x(p_i));
00760   position_Set_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body_out), body_split_array_it_Get_pos_y(p_i));
00761   position_Set_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body_out), body_split_array_it_Get_pos_z(p_i));
00762 
00763   body_Set_value(p_body_out, body_split_array_it_Get_value(p_i));
00764   position_Set_x(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_out), body_split_array_it_Get_fx(p_i));
00765   position_Set_y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_out), body_split_array_it_Get_fy(p_i));
00766   position_Set_z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body_out), body_split_array_it_Get_fz(p_i));
00767   position_Affect(body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body_out), body_split_array_it_Get_p_speed_vector(p_i));
00768 }

00821 
00822 /*********************************************************************************************
00823 **********************************************************************************************
00824 
00825    bodies_t
00826 
00827 **********************************************************************************************
00828 *********************************************************************************************/
00829 
00830 typedef body_split_array_t bodies_t;
00831 
00832 
00833 
00834 #define bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b) body_split_array_Nb_bodies(p_b)
00835 #define bodies_Get_value(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_value(p_b, body_number)
00836 #define bodies_Set_value(p_b, body_number, value) body_split_array_Set_value(p_b, body_number, value)
00837 #define bodies_Get_p_value(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_p_value(p_b, body_number)
00838 #define bodies_Get_pos_x(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_pos_x(p_b, body_number)
00839 #define bodies_Get_pos_y(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_pos_y(p_b, body_number)
00840 #define bodies_Get_pos_z(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_pos_z(p_b, body_number)
00841 #define bodies_Set_pos_x(p_b, body_number, new_pos_x) body_split_array_Set_pos_x(p_b, body_number, new_pos_x)
00842 #define bodies_Set_pos_y(p_b, body_number, new_pos_y) body_split_array_Set_pos_y(p_b, body_number, new_pos_y)
00843 #define bodies_Set_pos_z(p_b, body_number, new_pos_z) body_split_array_Set_pos_z(p_b, body_number, new_pos_z)
00844 #define bodies_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b, body_number)
00845 #define bodies_Set_position(p_b, body_number, p_new_position) body_array_Set_position(p_b, body_number, p_new_position)
00846 #define bodies_Set_speed_vector(p_b, body_number, p_new_speed_vector) body_split_array_Set_speed_vector(p_b, body_number, p_new_speed_vector)
00847 #define bodies_Get_fx(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_fx(p_b, body_number)
00848 #define bodies_Get_fy(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_fy(p_b, body_number)
00849 #define bodies_Get_fz(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Get_fz(p_b, body_number)
00850 #define bodies_Set_fx(p_b, body_number, new_fx) body_split_array_Set_fx(p_b, body_number, new_fx)
00851 #define bodies_Set_fy(p_b, body_number, new_fy) body_split_array_Set_fy(p_b, body_number, new_fy)
00852 #define bodies_Set_fz(p_b, body_number, new_fz) body_split_array_Set_fz(p_b, body_number, new_fz)
00853 #define bodies_Set_force_vector(p_b, body_number, p_new_force_vector) body_split_array_Set_force_vector(p_b, body_number, p_new_force_vector)
00854 
00855 
00856 #define bodies_Initialize(p_b, initial_size_allocated) body_split_array_Initialize(p_b, initial_size_allocated)
00857 #define bodies_Free(p_b)  body_split_array_Free(p_b)
00858 #define bodies_Realloc_arrays(p_b, new_size) body_split_array_Realloc_arrays(p_b, new_size)
00859 #define bodies_Clear(p_b)  body_split_array_Clear(p_b)
00860 #define bodies_ClearFP(p_b) body_split_array_ClearFP(p_b)
00861 #define bodies_Is_full(p_b) body_split_array_Is_full(p_b)
00862 #define bodies_Add(p_b, p_body) body_split_array_Add(p_b, p_body)
00863 #define bodies_Adjust_memory(p_b) body_split_array_Adjust_memory(p_b)
00864 #define bodies_Affect(p_target, p_src) body_split_array_Affect(p_target, p_src)
00865 #define bodies_Remove(p_b, body_number) body_split_array_Remove(p_b, body_number)
00866 #define bodies_Display(p_b, f) body_split_array_Display(p_b, f)
00867 #define bodies_Get_mem_used(p_b) body_split_array_Get_mem_used(p_b)

00878 /*********************************************************************************************
00879 **********************************************************************************************
00880 **********************************************************************************************
00881 
00882    BODIES WITHOUT SPLIT DATA (i.e. WITH BODY_T)
00883

00887

00889 
00890 /*********************************************************************************************
00891 **********************************************************************************************
00892 
00893    bodies_t
00894 
00895 **********************************************************************************************
00896 *********************************************************************************************/
00897 
00898 /*! This structure is used to store (retrieve, update ...) the fields of the bodies \n
00899   in each cell.  */
00900 typedef body_array_t bodies_t;
00901 
00902 #define bodies_Nb_bodies(p_b) body_array_Nb_bodies(p_b)
00903 #define bodies_Get_value(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_value(p_b, body_number)
00904 #define bodies_Set_value(p_b, body_number, value) body_array_Set_value(p_b, body_number, value)
00905 #define bodies_Get_p_value(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_p_value(p_b, body_number)
00906 #define bodies_Get_pos_x(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_pos_x(p_b, body_number)
00907 #define bodies_Get_pos_y(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_pos_y(p_b, body_number)
00908 #define bodies_Get_pos_z(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_pos_z(p_b, body_number)
00909 #define bodies_Set_pos_x(p_b, body_number, new_pos_x) body_array_Set_pos_x(p_b, body_number, new_pos_x)
00910 #define bodies_Set_pos_y(p_b, body_number, new_pos_y) body_array_Set_pos_y(p_b, body_number, new_pos_y)
00911 #define bodies_Set_pos_z(p_b, body_number, new_pos_z) body_array_Set_pos_z(p_b, body_number, new_pos_z)
00912 #define bodies_Set_position(p_b, body_number, p_new_position) body_array_Set_position(p_b, body_number, p_new_position)
00913 #define bodies_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b, body_number) /* only defined for body_array_t */
00914 #define bodies_Set_speed_vector(p_b, body_number, p_new_speed_vector) body_array_Set_speed_vector(p_b, body_number, p_new_speed_vector)
00915 #define bodies_Get_fx(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_fx(p_b, body_number) 
00916 #define bodies_Get_fy(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_fy(p_b, body_number) 
00917 #define bodies_Get_fz(p_b, body_number) body_array_Get_fz(p_b, body_number) 
00918 #define bodies_Set_fx(p_b, body_number, new_fx) body_array_Set_fx(p_b, body_number, new_fx) 
00919 #define bodies_Set_fy(p_b, body_number, new_fy) body_array_Set_fy(p_b, body_number, new_fy) 
00920 #define bodies_Set_fz(p_b, body_number, new_fz) body_array_Set_fz(p_b, body_number, new_fz) 
00921 #define bodies_Set_force_vector(p_b, body_number, p_new_force_vector) body_array_Set_force_vector(p_b, body_number, p_new_force_vector)
00922 
00923

00927 #define bodies_Initialize_with_bodies(p_b, p_bodies, nb_bodies) body_array_Initialize_with_bodies(p_b, p_bodies, nb_bodies)
00928 #define bodies_Free(p_b)  body_array_Free(p_b)
00929 #define bodies_Realloc_arrays(p_b, new_size) body_array_Realloc_arrays(p_b, new_size)
00930 #define bodies_Clear(p_b)  body_array_Clear(p_b)
00931 #define bodies_ClearFP(p_b) body_array_ClearFP(p_b)
00932 #define bodies_Is_full(p_b) body_array_Is_full(p_b)
00933 #define bodies_Add(p_b, p_body) body_array_Add(p_b, p_body)
00934 #define bodies_Adjust_memory(p_b) body_array_Adjust_memory(p_b)
00935 #define bodies_Affect(p_target, p_src) body_array_Affect(p_target, p_src)
00936 #define bodies_Remove(p_b, body_number) body_array_Remove(p_b, body_number)
00937 #define bodies_Display(p_b, f) body_array_Display(p_b, f)
00938 #define bodies_Get_mem_used(p_b) body_array_Get_mem_used(p_b)

00992 /*********************************************************************************************
00993 **********************************************************************************************
00994 
00995    To copy 2 bodies (we provide various kinds):
00996 
00997 **********************************************************************************************
00998 *********************************************************************************************/
00999 
01000 
01001 FMB_INLINE void copy_all_body_fields(COORDINATES_T *p_body_target_pos_x,
01002                                      COORDINATES_T body_src_pos_x,
01003                                      COORDINATES_T *p_body_target_pos_y,
01004                                      COORDINATES_T body_src_pos_y,
01005                                      COORDINATES_T *p_body_target_pos_z,
01006                                      COORDINATES_T body_src_pos_z,
01007                                      VALUES_T *p_body_target_value,
01008                                      VALUES_T body_src_value,
01009                                      COORDINATES_T *p_body_target_fx,
01010                                      COORDINATES_T body_src_fx,
01011                                      COORDINATES_T *p_body_target_fy,
01012                                      COORDINATES_T body_src_fy,
01013                                      COORDINATES_T *p_body_target_fz,
01014                                      COORDINATES_T body_src_fz,
01015                                      position_t *p_body_target_speed_vector,
01016                                      position_t *p_body_src_speed_vector){
01017   /* Copy of each field: */
01018   *p_body_target_pos_x = body_src_pos_x;
01019   *p_body_target_pos_y = body_src_pos_y;
01020   *p_body_target_pos_z = body_src_pos_z;
01021   *p_body_target_value = body_src_value;
01022   *p_body_target_fx = body_src_fx;
01023   *p_body_target_fy = body_src_fy;
01024   *p_body_target_fz = body_src_fz;
01025   position_Affect(p_body_target_speed_vector, p_body_src_speed_vector);
01026 }
01027 
01028 FMB_INLINE void Copy_body2body_array(body_array_t *p_b_target,
01029                                      bodies_ind_t body_target_number,
01030                                      body_t *p_body){
01031   copy_all_body_fields(position_Get_p_x(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01032                        position_Get_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01033                        position_Get_p_y(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01034                        position_Get_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01035                        position_Get_p_z(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01036                        position_Get_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01037                        body_array_Get_p_value(p_b_target, body_target_number),
01038                        body_Get_value(p_body),
01039                        position_Get_p_x(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01040                        position_Get_x(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01041                        position_Get_p_y(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01042                        position_Get_y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01043                        position_Get_p_z(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01044                        position_Get_z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01045                        body_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number),
01046                        body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body));
01047 }
01048 
01049 FMB_INLINE void Copy_body2body_split_array(body_split_array_t *p_b_target,
01050                                            bodies_ind_t body_target_number,
01051                                            body_t *p_body){
01052   copy_all_body_fields(p_b_target->p_pos_x + body_target_number,
01053                        position_Get_x(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01054                        p_b_target->p_pos_y + body_target_number,
01055                        position_Get_y(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01056                        p_b_target->p_pos_z + body_target_number,
01057                        position_Get_z(body_Get_p_position(p_body)),
01058                        body_split_array_Get_p_value(p_b_target, body_target_number),
01059                        body_Get_value(p_body),
01060                        p_b_target->p_fx + body_target_number,
01061                        position_Get_x(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01062                        p_b_target->p_fy + body_target_number,
01063                        position_Get_y(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01064                        p_b_target->p_fz + body_target_number,
01065                        position_Get_z(body_Get_p_force_vector(p_body)),
01066                        body_split_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number),
01067                        body_Get_p_speed_vector(p_body));
01068 }
01069 
01070 
01071 FMB_INLINE void Copy_body_array2body_array(body_array_t *p_b_target,
01072                                            bodies_ind_t body_target_number,
01073                                            body_array_t *p_b_src,
01074                                            bodies_ind_t body_src_number){
01075   copy_all_body_fields(position_Get_p_x(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01076                        position_Get_x(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_src, body_src_number)),
01077                        position_Get_p_y(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01078                        position_Get_y(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_src, body_src_number)),
01079                        position_Get_p_z(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01080                        position_Get_z(body_array_Get_p_position(p_b_src, body_src_number)),
01081                        body_array_Get_p_value(p_b_target, body_target_number),
01082                        body_array_Get_value(p_b_src, body_src_number),
01083                        position_Get_p_x(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01084                        position_Get_x(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_src, body_src_number)),
01085                        position_Get_p_y(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01086                        position_Get_y(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_src, body_src_number)),
01087                        position_Get_p_z(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number)),
01088                        position_Get_z(body_array_Get_p_force_vector(p_b_src, body_src_number)),
01089                        body_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number),
01090                        body_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b_src, body_src_number));
01091 }
01092 
01093 FMB_INLINE void Copy_body_split_array2body_split_array(body_split_array_t *p_b_target,
01094                                                        bodies_ind_t body_target_number,
01095                                                        body_split_array_t *p_b_src,
01096                                                        bodies_ind_t body_src_number){
01097   copy_all_body_fields(p_b_target->p_pos_x + body_target_number,
01098                        body_split_array_Get_pos_x(p_b_src, body_src_number),
01099                        p_b_target->p_pos_y + body_target_number,
01100                        body_split_array_Get_pos_y(p_b_src, body_src_number),
01101                        p_b_target->p_pos_z + body_target_number,
01102                        body_split_array_Get_pos_z(p_b_src, body_src_number),
01103                        body_split_array_Get_p_value(p_b_target, body_target_number),
01104                        body_split_array_Get_value(p_b_src, body_src_number),
01105                        p_b_target->p_fx + body_target_number,
01106                        body_split_array_Get_fx(p_b_src, body_src_number),
01107                        p_b_target->p_fy + body_target_number,
01108                        body_split_array_Get_fy(p_b_src, body_src_number),
01109                        p_b_target->p_fz + body_target_number,
01110                        body_split_array_Get_fz(p_b_src, body_src_number),
01111                        body_split_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b_target, body_target_number),
01112                        body_split_array_Get_p_speed_vector(p_b_src, body_src_number));
01113 }
01114 
01115 
01116 #ifdef _BODIES_SPLIT_DATA_
01117 #define Copy_body2bodies(p_b_target, body_target_number, p_body) Copy_body2body_split_array(p_b_target, body_target_number, p_body)
01118 #define Copy_bodies2bodies(p_b_target, body_target_number,  p_b_src, body_src_number) Copy_body_split_array2body_split_array(p_b_target, body_target_number,  p_b_src, body_src_number)
01119 #else /* #ifdef _BODIES_SPLIT_DATA_ */
01120 #define Copy_body2bodies(p_b_target, body_target_number, p_body) Copy_body2body_array(p_b_target, body_target_number, p_body)
01121 #define Copy_bodies2bodies(p_b_target, body_target_number,  p_b_src, body_src_number) Copy_body_array2body_array(p_b_target, body_target_number,  p_b_src, body_src_number)
01122 #endif /* #ifdef _BODIES_SPLIT_DATA_ */

01263 
01264 /*! Warning: a call to this function causes the iterator to 'points' on the next body. */
01265 FMB_INLINE void bodies_it_Remove_current(bodies_it_t *p_i){
01266   /* We need to access *p_corresponding_bodies
01267    * to update p_corresponding_bodies->nb_bodies */
01268   bodies_Remove(bodies_it_Get_bodies(p_i), 
01269                 bodies_Nb_bodies(bodies_it_Get_bodies(p_i)) - 2 - p_i->counter);
01270   --p_i->counter;
01271 }
